Pneumonia: Get vaccinated to reduce your risk of pneumonia.
Wash your hands regularly to avoid respiratory infections.
Avoid smoking as it damages your lungs and lowers immunity.
Stay away from people who are sick to prevent infection.
Rest and drink plenty of fluids if you feel unwell.
Seek medical help if you experience chest pain or persistent cough.
Maintain good hygiene and ensure a clean living environment.
If diagnosed, complete your full course of antibiotics.
